embeds.title: About Exton Member Pass
embeds.description: With Member Pass, you can use the Twitter Checker inside our Discord with special limits and exclusive benefits. Gain access to a powerful tool that helps you verify identities, detect scams, and stay ahead in the Web3 space. Whether you're an individual looking for extra security or a community manager ensuring a safer environment, our plans are designed to meet your needs.

embeds.title: Tiers
embeds.description:
:warning: *Repeated checks don't count. For more details, see our [docs](https://exton-scam-tracker.gitbook.io/docs) to review our terms and services.*

:warning: *Also Spots are limited to maintain optimal server performance and ensure dedicated support for all users*

fields.name: Seeker (~~$44.97~~ → $<price3months-seeker> for 3 months! :tada: or $<pricePerMonth-seeker> per month)
